io::​reader_config
sp_base_object
io::​ .​reader_config

Base reader configuration object class.

Variables
m_file_handle
int m_file_handle

A handle to the file, when no file is open, it is set to 0 by default.

Method <is_open()> may be used to check if a file is currently open.

m_file_path
string m_file_path

The path to the file IO.

m_file_mode
string m_file_mode

The mode in which the file should be opened, since this is a reader, it is either "r" for normal reading or "rb" for reading binary data.
